summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to accept a donation to The City of Seattle for open space, park and recreation purposes of certain real property legally described as Lots 11 and 12, Block 3, Broadway Second Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 7 of Plats, page 17, in King County, Washington, from Daniel M. Streissguth and Ann P. Streissguth, subject to a lease back to the Streissguths.
